metadata.title: CVE-2021-33618 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dolibarr ERP and CRM 13.0.2 allows XSS via object details, as demonstratedby > and < characters in the onpointermove attribute of a BODY element tothe user-management feature.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
